TopicTitle: Issue targetting bodies - Other craft always selected

Articles.Content:
I have an issue, when I have craft orbiting a body, say Duna, it is near impossible to easily target said body, Duna, from another body such as Kerbin.  The game constantly wishes to select the craft that are orbiting, instead of the actual planet.  
Would it not make more sense to prioritize the selection of the body when viewing from far away in the map view, rather than any of the craft currently already in orbit?

In the image below, from Kerbin, it's simply impossible to do without double clicking one of the craft to go into Duna's SOI and selecting Duna, only to do the same thing to get back to the craft in Kerbin Orbit.
It's actually the 10th most upvoted bug on the KERB list, here the bug report:
The workaround is to focus said craft, then zoom in and set your target to the CB

6 hours ago, kdaviper said:

The workaround is to focus said craft, then zoom in and set your target to the CB

Yes but its pretty annoying, I found that flight plan let you select bodies easy it you use that mod.

I honestly searched the forum using key words, and didn't find anything, and hadn't thought to check the bug list (unsure this classifies as a bug per say?) but I appreciate being informed about this!  Nice to see that the team feel it is an issue that can be fixed.
